JobFullDesc: About the RoleShape the future of Uber’s development platform by driving product development that delights our engineers and ultimately enables them to ship code as fast as possible, while ensuring reliability & performance.  In this role, you will contribute to our mission of empowering Uber’s engineers to deliver apps and services at Uber’s pace and Uber’s scale.  What the Candidate Will DoCreate product strategy and define the end-to-end development experience for Uber engineers across all Uber products.Develop highly scalable solutions with predictable SLAs across multiple apps and services involving a wide range of platforms and languages (Swift, Objective C, Go, Python, Java) for hundreds of teams and thousands of engineers working on a large codebase that’s growing rapidlyCollaborate with a wide mix of infrastructure developers, distributed systems engineers, programming language researchers, data scientists, and machine learning specialistsMove the needle on developer efficiency in a measurable way. Basic QualificationsA computer science undergraduate degree or other engineering degree equivalentMinimum 2 years experience delivering highly successful and innovative developer efficiency platforms with your fingerprints all over them - you’re very proud of what you’ve accomplishedMinimum 7 years of product management experienceStrong understanding of Mobile/Services development and CI services/infrastructure technologyOur processes and programs are data-driven and you should be adept in storytelling using data Preferred QualificationsWorked in a Large Scale SaaS based environmentGood in-depth knowledge of DevOps Concepts, Tooling and Metrics
